body:
### Description

When using the nelua lsp with Raylib.nelua I'm getting error message while editing. Please let me know if I should be reporting this elsewhere, or if there are more steps I can take to help debug the issue.

### Neovim version

NVIM v0.10.0-dev-dc9f7b8
Build type: RelWithDebInfo
LuaJIT 2.1.1700008891


### Nvim-lspconfig version

4834708

### Operating system and version

Manjaro Linux

### Affected language servers

nelua-lsp

### Steps to reproduce

the file I'm editing contains simply:

```
require 'raylib'
rl.
```

The error happens right after typing 'rl.', and only seems to happen if I type it quickly, if i type slowly character by character I don't get an error.

### Actual behavior

When using the nelua lsp with Raylib.nelua I'm getting the following error:

```
LSP[nelua_lsp]: Error INVALID_SERVER_MESSAGE: {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
  error = {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
    code = -32601,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
    message = "MethodNotFound"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
  },                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
  jsonrpc = "2.0"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
}             
```



### Expected behavior

I expected no errors popping up

### Minimal config

```Lua
require'lspconfig'.nelua_lsp.setup {
        cmd = { "nelua", "-L", "/home/kitty/programs/nelua-lsp/", "--script", "/home/kitty/programs/nelua-lsp/nelua-lsp.lua" },
      }
```


### LSP log

https://gist.github.com/snowkittykira/31d1d884ebf4916a0f7ae5cc11797bd5

comment_data.body:
> LSP[nelua_lsp]: Error INVALID_SERVER_MESSAGE: {

that comes from Nvim lsp: https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/cdc8bacc7945da816738e330555fa85d3ffffd56/runtime/lua/vim/lsp/rpc.lua#L480-L482

the previous message in your log is : 

```
[ERROR][2023-11-17 10:43:08] .../vim/lsp/rpc.lua:675	"rpc"	"/usr/bin/nelua"	"stderr"
'
LSP - textDocument/didChange
LSP - $/cancelRequest
error: unsupported method "nil"
LSP - textDocument/didChange
LSP - textDocument/completion
'
```
thank you, in that case should I report it as an issue to the neovim project instead?

title: Errors when typing too quickly with nelua_lsp (MethodNotFound)
